JOIN OUR DISCORD COMMUNITY
Operation Sustainability
One of the biggest problem statements in human history is solving for sustainability in today’s world. Web3’s circular, participatory economy that is decentralised and incentivised, hosts a treasure trove of potential to make some serious strides in Sustainability! Show us how you can revolutionise sustainability-based solutions by picking one of the problem statements shared.
Some problem statements to get you started.
Fractional ownership of power generation
As energy consumption is putting life as we know it on risk at breath-taking threat levels, there is a clarion call for innovators to create energy management systems that will engage the general public to participate and get incentives to potentially reduce dependency to the unsustainable energy generation habits.
Token incentivised circular economies
Token-incentivised circular economies are a great inventive method to create sustainable models across various use cases in various technology verticals; be it waste management, agriculture, e-waste, etc. There is also room to involve and connect various stakeholders in the value chain. Get your thinking caps on show us your best version of token incentivised circular economies.
Carbon credit tokenisation
Carbon Credit tokenisation is a very relevant usecase in the Web3 space that several platforms are adopting to ensure that there is accountability for energy consumption. The task lies in creating a circular economy, creating fluid networks and engaging incentivises. Show us how you would make the world a better place!
